00031 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( TemplateFileReaderTest );
00032 
00033 #define TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE "../data/file_does_not_exist";
00034 #define TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID "../data/test.file.data_header_only"
00035 #define TEST_DATA_FILE "../data/MIAME.xml"

00051 void TemplateFileReaderTest::CheckTemplateData(bool headerOnly)
00052 {
00053         TemplateFileReader reader;
00054         TemplateData temp;
00055         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp, headerOnly) == true);
00057 
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.DataTypeIdentifier() == TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.TemplateFileIdentifier() == std::string("987-987-987"));
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 9:00AM");
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00062 
00063         if (headerOnly)
00064                 return;
00065 
00066         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = temp.UserAttributes();
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 23 );
00068 
00069         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Genus" );
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"Unknown" );
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == true );
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00075         ++userIt;
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Species" );
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00081         ++userIt;
00082         ++userIt;
00083         ++userIt;
00084         ++userIt;
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sex" );
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 4 );
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlSingleParameterType);
00090         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cit = (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00092         ++cit;
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Female" );
00094         ++cit;
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Unknown" );
00096         ++cit;
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00098         ++userIt;
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Age" );
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetDefaultValueText() == L"" );
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00104 }

00106 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read()
00107 {
00108         CheckTemplateData(false);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_header_data_only()
00112 {
00113         CheckTemplateData(true);
00114 }

00116 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_does_not_exist()
00117 {
00118         TemplateFileReader reader;
00119         TemplateData temp;
00120         std::string name = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp) == false);
00122 }
00123 
00124 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_is_not_valid()
00125 {
00126         TemplateFileReader reader;
00127         TemplateData temp;
00128         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, temp) == false);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_IsFileType()
00133 {
00134         std::string file;
00135 
00136         file = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00138 
00139         file = TEST_DATA_FILE_INVALID;
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == false);
00141 
00142         file = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(file, TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER) == true );
00144 }
00145 
00146 void TemplateFileReaderTest::testmethod_DataTypeIdentifierStatic()
00147 {
00148         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00149         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType guid;
00150         guid = TemplateFileReader::DataTypeIdentifier(name);
00151 
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(guid == TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00153 }
